mapper.sql: id, company_id, process_name, description, process_code, flag_avaliable, flag_deleted, create_person, create_time, update_person, update_time, avaliable_time
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into wp_cfg_process
id,
company_id,
process_name,
description,
process_code,
flag_avaliable,
flag_deleted,
create_person,
create_time,
update_person,
update_time,
avaliable_time,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{processName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{processCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{flagAvaliable,jdbcType=BIT},
#{flagDeleted,jdbcType=BIT},
#{createPerson,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updatePerson,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{avaliableTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update wp_cfg_process
company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
process_name = #{processName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
process_code = #{processCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flag_avaliable = #{flagAvaliable,jdbcType=BIT},
flag_deleted = #{flagDeleted,jdbcType=BIT},
create_person = #{createPerson,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_person = #{updatePerson,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
avaliable_time = #{avaliableTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select process.id, process.process_name processName, process.description, process.process_code processCode, process.create_time createTime, pv.flag_avaliable flagAvailable, pv.id versionId from wp_cfg_process process left join wp_cfg_process_version pv on pv.cfg_process_id=process.id where process.company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and process.flag_deleted=0 and process.flag_avaliable=1 and pv.flag_is_last=1
